common.runtime

Class RuntimeObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.runtime.RuntimeObject

  • public abstract class RuntimeObject
extends CObject
    The RuntimeObject class is a base class for all stage RuntimeObject classes within the Poros framework.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Nov 17, 2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuntimeObject(Stage stage, TargetData targetData, NetlistConstraint netlistConstraint, results.netlist.Netlist netlist, RuntimeEnv runEnv)
      Initializes a newly created RuntimeObject with its stage set to parameter stage, its targetData set to parameter targetData, its netlist set to parameter netlist, and, its runEnv set to parameter runEnv.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuntimeObject

        public RuntimeObject(Stage stage,
                     TargetData targetData,
                     NetlistConstraint netlistConstraint,
                     results.netlist.Netlist netlist,
                     RuntimeEnv runEnv)
        Initializes a newly created RuntimeObject with its stage set to parameter stage, its targetData set to parameter targetData, its netlist set to parameter netlist, and, its runEnv set to parameter runEnv.
        Parameters:
        stage - Stage used during execution
        targetData - TargetData used during execution
        netlistConstraint - NetlistConstraint used during execution
        netlist - Netlist used during execution
        runEnv - RuntimeEnv used during execution
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if any of the parameters are null

      • preprocessing

        protected void preprocessing()
        Perform postprocessing. Executes the following methods in sequential order:
        prepareDataFactory()
        prepareStageNetlistData()
        setAlgorithmProfile(AlgorithmProfile)
        prepareNetlistData()

      • executeAlgo

        protected void executeAlgo(Algorithm algo)
        Executes Algorithm algo
        Parameters:
        algo - the Algorithm to execute
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if algo is invalid

      • postprocessing

        protected void postprocessing()
        Perform postprocessing

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Executes the RuntimeObject. Executes the following methods in sequential order:
        preprocessing()
        runAlgo()
        postprocessing()
